class.name: commander.ontology.Subordinate
class.description: This element represents all agents subordinate to the commander.

method.name: canPerformTask
method.description: Returns 'true' if this subordinate can perform the issued mission.

argument.name: missionName
argument.description: The 'string' name of the mission ("agent.behaviors.tasks.moveTo" for instance).

method.name: getPosition
method.description: Returns the sim position. Used for integration layer.
